item.title: Enterprise Communications Services To The Cloud
item.description:
A significant shift from traditional phone systems to cloud-based communication is happening right now. XO Communications, a leader in this field, predicts 60% of companies will move almost a third of their voice communications to the cloud in the coming years. For a free consultation and quotes tailored to your company’s communication needs, our partners at Telarus offer fast and reliable service from expert product specialists. Contact them at http://www.cloudnetworkingservices.com/...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enterprise-communications-services-to-the-cloud/

item.title: Advanced Manufacturing Driving Faster WANs
item.description:
The recent “Great Recession” stands out not just for its severity, but also for the uneven recovery that followed. While businesses have bounced back, job growth has lagged. This unusual trend has been attributed to unexpected gains in productivity, where output increases without a proportional rise in employment. But is this sustainable or merely a blip in the current economic climate? The saying “everything old is new again” rings true. While new applications and technologies emerge, they often echo past advancements driven by innovation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/advanced-manufacturing-driving-faster-wans/
